[[File:Soothe bell.png|thumb|475px]]
===Description=== The Soothe Bell costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] in [[Johto]], [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Verdanturf Town]] in [[Hoenn]], and [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Hearthome City]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Pichu.png|40px]] Pichu || [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu |- | [[File:Cleffa.png|40px]] Cleffa || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy |- | [[File:Igglybuff.png|40px]] Igglybuff || [[File:Jigglypuff.png|40px]] Jigglypuff |- | [[File:Togepi.png|40px]] Togepi || [[File:Togetic.png|40px]] Togetic |- | Azurill || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Crobat.png|40px]] Crobat |- | Budew || | Roselia |- | Buneary || | Lopunny |- | Riolu || | Lucario |- | [[File:Eevee.png|40px]] Eevee || [[File:Espeon.png|40px]] Espeon (6am-6pm) & [[File:Umbreon.png|40px]] Umbreon (6pm-6am) |- | [[File:Chansey.png|40px]] Chansey || | Blissey |- | Munchlax || [[File:Snorlax.png|40px]] Snorlax |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]

[[File:Soothe bell.png|thumb|475px]]
===Description=== The Soothe Bell costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] in [[Johto]], [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Verdanturf Town]] in [[Hoenn]], and [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Hearthome City]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Pichu.png|40px]] Pichu || [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu |- | [[File:Cleffa.png|40px]] Cleffa || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy |- | [[File:Igglybuff.png|40px]] Igglybuff || [[File:Jigglypuff.png|40px]] Jigglypuff |- | [[File:Togepi.png|40px]] Togepi || [[File:Togetic.png|40px]] Togetic |- | Azurill || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Crobat.png|40px]] Crobat |- | Budew || | Roselia |- | Buneary || | Lopunny |- | Riolu || | Lucario |- | [[File:Eevee.png|40px]] Eevee || [[File:Espeon.png|40px]] Espeon (6am-6pm) & [[File:Umbreon.png|40px]] Umbreon |- | [[File:Chansey.png|40px]] Chansey || | Blissey |- | Munchlax || [[File:Snorlax.png|40px]] Snorlax |}
